item.description: OPENING SESSION 08:30 – 08:40 Opening remarks - Prof. Hua Ye (Associate Professor in Engineering Science, Deputy Director of CRMI Technology Centre, University of Oxford) 08:40 – 08:50 Speech from the special guest - Mr. Sunan Jiang (Minister Counsellor for Science and Technology Affairs, Chinese Embassy in the UK) 08:50 – 09:00 Welcome speech from the University of Oxford - Prof. Xin Lu (FMedSci, FRS, Professor of Cancer Biology, Director of Ludwig Cancer Research, University of Oxford)
